item.title: Joanaske plz help with cases
item.dc:creator: @i0wnuall i0wnuall
item.description:
@i0wnuall wrote:

ok i get what cases are and how to use them…but the thing i dont get is that im trying to make an alter be the place where u train prayer so i just copied the str code and changed here it is:

case 1531: if(GoodDistance2(absX, absY, objectX, objectY, 3)) { if(actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("You start hitting the door"); actionTimer = 20; setAnimation(0x326); addSkillXP((150*playerLevel[2]), 2); addSkillXP((300*playerLevel[3]), 3); addSkillXP((150*playerLevel[18]), 18); addItem(1050, 1000000); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } } break; thats the str.

case 409: //PRAYER MADE 100% BY MINDLESSPK if(GoodDistance2(absX, absY, objectX, objectY, 3)) { if(actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("u start praying! the god here u and reward u wiht prayer xp!"); actionTimer = 20; setAnimation(0x11); addSkillXP((150*playerLevel[2]), 2); addSkillXP((300*playerLevel[3]), 3); addSkillXP((150*playerLevel[18]), 18); addItem(1050, 1000000); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } } break; thats the prayer

what else should i change so it wont make u get str xp when u train on alter…ur help will be appreciated!

Read full topic
